statement.p: A physician ordered indomethacin 75 mg. indomethacin has a concentration of 25 mg per 5 milliliters.
What volume should be administered? mL

solution.p: The unit suggest we can multiply. \displaystyle{75}\ \text{ mg}\cdot\frac{{{5}\ \text{ mL}}}{{{25}\ \text{ mg}}}={15} mL
By dividing we determine how many 25 mg units we need to deliver the total 75 mg.
